thread.title: The most coziest NYC hotel Lexington -
thread.title_full: The most coziest NYC hotel Lexington - Review of The Lexington New York City, Autograph Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sen M
title: The most coziest NYC hotel Lexington -
text:
I have been here many times love it .Compact yet cozy lobby and bar ,the location amazing staff makes it so special .I love most Marriott's in NYC including the Marquis but this is my spot to feel special. Irina the guest relations manager is amazing .She makes everything so accessible and easy in NYC.She is something else .
I think we look forward to see her at times as much as going to NYC
I wish the rooms were bit larger but the overwhelmingly friendly staff makes up the shortcoming .We shall back again and again and again
